author: Jo-Anne Rowney
title: Netflix just released new Stranger Things 2 images and an official synopsis showing what happened to Will Byers - Mirror Online
text:
Netflix just released new Stranger Things 2 images and an official synopsis showing what happened to Will Byers We finally have a clue about Stranger Things season 2 Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Goosebumps? Stranger Things 2 trailer drops during Super Bowl LI Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Netflix has kept any information about Stranger Things season 2 close to its chest so fans will be pleased to hear we've finally been given a look at what's to come. 
The set of five pictures released show Will returning to school and Winona Ryder looking as worried as ever as well as Sheriff Hopper in the woods. 
The streaming site also released an official synopsis with the photos saying: "A year after Will’s return, everything seems back to normal… but a darkness lurks just beneath the surface, threatening all of Hawkins." 
While it doesn't give too much away, the teaser trailer shown at the Super Bowl hinted at a larger problem than season one as big 'beasts' loom over the town. 
Eleven is also back, but may look a little different to what we're used to. Read More The kids seem to love these Ghostbusters costumes (Photo: Netflix) Winona Ryder still looks pretty worried Read More Will is back at school There's new faces (Photo: Netflix) Sheriff Hopper is still lurking in the woods (Photo: Netflix) 
The crew have spoken out about the lengths they have to go to keep spoilers under wraps, even turning to Game of Thrones producers for advice. 
“We had no security protocols last season and we have extensive security protocols this season,” executive producer Shawn Levy said. “I can’t speak about what they are because then people could crack them. We protect every story point, every page of every script.” 
Stranger Things 2 will drop on Netflix on Halloween. Read More
